LanguageData.Hediffs_Cooking.label: Cooking Knowledge
LanguageData.Hediffs_Cooking.description: Ryōri (Cooking) Knowledge: I eat with gratitude for all the ingredients in the world!\nKnowledge is power, and what better way to learn than to eat, eat, eat! Kanpai!
